frameDefinitions: An Agent, which may be an individual or group, is engaged in a complex Activity.
A Self-moving Escapee departs from an Undesirable_location.
An Agent works on a Project so that it reaches a more advanced and desirable state.
This frame contains words referring to items of food.

This is an abstract frame for durative activities, in which the Agent enters an ongoing state of the Activity, remains in this state for some Duration of Time, and leaves this state either by finishing or by stopping.
The frame concerns the vehicles that human beings use for the purpose of transportation.
frameExamples: The New Car Assessment <t>Program</t> (NCAP) is dedicated to helping the public buy a safer car.
Specialties include deep fried shredded beef , duck , prawn dishes and hand-made <t>noodles</t>.
I drove a <t>limo</t> to the school dance.
listRoleDefinitions: The individual or organization that carries out the project.
An area of human endeavor, typically scientifc in nature, in which the <fen>Agent</fen>'s <fen>Activity</fen> falls.
What the <fen>Agent</fen> (an individual or the members of an organization) are dedicated to doing.
The larger aim that the <fen>Agent</fen> is pursuing by carrying out certain coordinated measures.
An entity (abstract or concrete) which is involved in an implicit <fen>Activity</fen>.
The ongoing plan of action which allows the <fen>Agent</fen> to pursue the <fen>Activity</fen>.
The time at which the <fen>Project</fen> is ongoing.
The location where a <fen>Project</fen> is pursued.
The <fen>Escapee</fen> manages to leave the <fen>Undesirable_location</fen>.
The <fex name='Undesirable_location'>Undesirable_location</fex> is where the Escapee begins.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the escaping occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the Escaping occurs.
The object or idea that undergoes change due to the efforts of the <fen>Agent</fen>.
The individual that brings about the development of the <fen>Project</fen>.
The time at which the progress occurs.
The location at which the the <fen>Project</fen> progresses.
This role identifies the <fen>Activity</fen> in which the  <fen>Agent</fen>  is engaged.
The <fen>Agent</fen> is engaged in the <fen>Activity</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Activity</fen> occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Activity</fen> occurs.
Vehicle is the transportation device that the human beings use to travel.This role is incorporated into each LU in this frame.
listRoleExamples: The <fex>DOE</fex> Human Genome Program also has developed high-throughput approaches to identifying is-regulatory sequences in the human and other genomes
Several projects <fex>in computational linguistics</fex> have recently stalled due to lack of funding .
The <fex>New Car Assessment</fex> Program (NCAP) is dedicated to helping the public buy a safer car.
The program <fex>to analyze the composition of Titan's sludge</fex> is nearly complete.
Iran has vowed to continue its <fex>nuclear</fex> program and is demanding that sanctions against it should be lifted .
